text:
Mahmoud Sadeghi () is an Iranian lawyer, jurist, academic and reformist politician. He is a member of the Parliament of Iran representing Tehran, Rey, Shemiranat and Eslamshahr electoral district.
On 25 February 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Sadeghi tested positive for SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes coronavirus disease 2019.

annotations.surface_form: Tehran, Rey, Shemiranat and Eslamshahr electoral district
